about_the_game:
Nina was very ill her entire life until a miraculous cure was found. This cure is made of herbs only growing inside Bleeding Forest that spreads beyond a wall on the Island of Scarlet Tear. As she regains her strength she has to face the consequences of people entering this once forbidden forest and releasing its secrets.

Explore the Island of Scarlet Tear with Nina and discover all its dark secrets. Solve puzzles, unlock new abilities, defeat monsters and get to know all kinds of folk living on the island. Help Nina solve the enigma of Bleeding Forest.
